column5: Just wondering if anyone on the board here make there own jigs and sell them.  Cheers Mitch
I can pop a few out to you...what  are you looking for?

I can pop a few out to you...what  are you looking for?  Can you make a bladed jig, something like this?  http://www.northlandtackle.com/Category/main.taf?cat=167  Put me down for a bunch if you can.  Love the extra flash in the tanin stained waters I fish up north.
